Source.Name: alkimia
Source.Summary: Common storage and business logic used by financial applications
Source.Description: Alkimia is the infrastructure for common storage and business logic that will be used by all financial applications in KDE. The target is to share financial related information over application bounderies.

Package.Name: alkimia
